revised_title: Anatomy of the Sea Otter: A Detailed Description of its External and Internal Features
tldr: This article provides a detailed description of the external and internal anatomy of the sea otter, including its physical appearance, fur, skeletal structure, and organs. The study was conducted by Everard Home and Archibald Menzies, who examined two sea otters, one a cub and the other a full-grown adult.
